section.title: Description
section.paragraph: Here is the way to create distributed authentication application web archive for OpenSSO. You have to do the followings to setup this application.

orderedlist.item:
on the shell prompt,
scripts/setup.sh (have to chmod to make it executable) for Unix and Linux; or
scripts/setup.bat for Windows.
This setup class will prompt for some server information; create the AMConfig.properties file under war/WEB-INF/classes directory.
type ant war to create the WAR file and deploy it.

section.paragraph: Note: Ant (http://www.ant.org) version 1.6 or higher is needed for the creation of web archive.
